name: Assassin’s Creed® Rogue - Time Saver: Technology Pack
detailed_description:
Obtain all the Upgrade Blueprints to unlock the Elite ship upgrades.

Important: You need to progress in the story to see the full effect of the DLC. Some upgrades still require money and resources to purchase them.
